## CEDEFOP's dashboard for greenness and green pervasiveness in occupations
### Description

This dashboard shows trends in greenness and green pervasiveness  over time and within selected occupations for a chosen year/quarter. The word cloud displays the top 50 green skills for the selected occupations, defined by ESCO v 1.1.1 and augmented by Cedefop.
